text: paṟayuka: niṅṅaḷuṭe mukaḷ bhāgatt ninnēā, niṅṅaḷuṭe kālukaḷuṭe cuvaṭṭil ninnēā niṅṅaḷuṭe mēl śikṣa ayakkuvān, alleṅkil niṅṅaḷe bhinnakakṣikaḷākki āśayakkuḻappattilākkukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷil cilarkk maṟṟu cilaruṭe pīḍanaṁ anubhavippikkukayuṁ ceyyān kaḻivuḷḷavanatre avan. nēākkū; avar grahikkuvān vēṇṭi nāṁ teḷivukaḷ vividha rūpattil vivariccukeāṭukkunnat eṅṅaneyāṇenn‌
